about.aboutContent:
WebApp Description: 

This is an interactive map that have the analysis capability allowing the users to find health related facilities in Toronto within walking distance from their desired location. 

Health Facilities include: 
1. Hospital (Blue point)
2. Clinics (Green point)
3. Pharmacy (Yellow point)
4. Veterinary (Purple point)
5. Social Facility (Orange point)

Webapp Functions: 
1. Search Bar - allow users to find a specific location by typing address or postal code. 
2. Infor Summary - provide users a summary of the search result. The users are able to know the number of each type of health facilities located near their desired location.
3. Pop-up Window - give users additional information for each search result. For example: organization name, open hour and etc.
4. Printer - the searched result can be converted to pdf file and allow users to print out for convenience purposes.
